import React from 'react'; class CocktailForm extends React.Component { state = { image_url: "", name: "", description: "", instructions: "" } saveCocktail = (event) => { event.preventDefault() fetch("http://localhost:3000/cocktails", { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", "Access-Token": localStorage.getItem("token") }, body: JSON.stringify(this.state) }).then(res => res.json()) .then(cocktail => this.props.addCocktail(cocktail)) } render = () =>
this.setState({ name: e.target.value })} />
this.setState({ image_url: e.target.value })} />
this.setState({ image_url: e.target.value })} />
this.setState({ image_url: e.target.value })} />
} export default CocktailForm;
